TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit OraclePermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission

Docs.summary: Enables the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle to help ensure that a user has a security level adequate to access an Oracle database.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This type is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the .NET Framework. For more information, see [Oracle and ADO.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OraclePermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> property takes precedence over the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OraclePermission.AllowBlankPassword%2A> property. Therefore, if you set <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OraclePermission.AllowBlankPassword%2A> to `false`, you must also set <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OraclePermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> to `false` to prevent a user from making a connection using a blank password.
For an example demonstrating how to use security demands, see [Code Access Security and ADO.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public OraclePermission (System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState state);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState state) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Add (string connectionString, string restrictions, System.Data.KeyRestrictionBehavior behavior);
.method public hidebysig instance void Add(string connectionString, string restrictions, valuetype System.Data.KeyRestrictionBehavior behavior) cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a new set of permissions.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool AllowBlankPassword { get; set; }
.property instance bool AllowBlankPassword

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether a blank password is allowed.
Docs.value: if a blank password is allowed, otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> enumeration takes precedence over the AllowBlankPassword property. Therefore, if you set AllowBlankPassword to false, you must also set <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> to `None` to prevent a user from making a connection using a blank password.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Security.IPermission Copy ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Copy() cil managed

Docs.summary: When implemented by a derived class, creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission object.
Docs.returns: A copy of the current permission object.

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Security.IPermission Intersect (System.Security.IPermission target);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Intersect(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed

Docs.param: A permission to intersect with the current permission. It must be of the same type as the current permission.
Docs.summary: When implemented by a derived class, creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
Docs.returns: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission. This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed

Docs.param: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship. This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.
Docs.summary: When implemented by a derived class, determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.
Docs.returns: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsUnrestricted ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsUnrestricted() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a value indicating whether the permission can be represented as unrestricted without any knowledge of the permission semantics.
Docs.returns: if the permission can be represented as unrestricted.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Security.SecurityElement ToXml ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.SecurityElement ToXml() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
Docs.returns: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Security.IPermission Union (System.Security.IPermission target);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Union(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed

Docs.param: A permission to combine with the current permission. It must be of the same type as the current permission.
Docs.summary: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
Docs.returns: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
